TopicTitle: List Savegames In order of the Last Played One

Articles.Content:
KSP doesn't do this for some reason. I have to search a sea of savegames to find the one I just played, and had to exit to change the settings!

Of course I can remove my saves, but what if I want to keep all of them there?
Date code the name? 1504021400_something_descriptive would be April 4, 2015 2pm. Just a thought, assuming it is now alphabetical. I can't recall...
